column4: Does anyone know whether the xorg-air-core package on dapper has the updates nessecary to make it work Beryl+suspend/resume?
he could always have used google.

I read on the beryl forms that the AIGLX/x.org patches exist, but my laptop still hates suspend/resume.  Do you know if these patches really do exist; if so, could you point me in the direction to compile X with them added?
